page.title: 05A Farmer's Year - East Hyde
page.content: {SEPT:}Plough into the ground the residue of previous crops.Go over with a cultivator and harrow and apply fertilizers, potash, phosphates and low level nitrogen. {OCT:}Use a drill to plant the seeds and cover using a harrow. {NOV: Treat the seeds with a herbicide. {FEB:}Go over emerging crops with nitrogen and fertilizer to encourage strong growth. {MAR:}Roll the crops to firm the roots. {MAR._ April:}Examine the crops to discover any pests or weeds. If found, treat with fungicide at end of April to kill mildew.If weeds,eg. clover or thistles are found use a herbicide. {MAY:}The wheat by now is on ear, so inspect for disease and apply a fungicide. Give a final nitrogen dressing which is vital for quality. {AUGUST: 14th.-21st.}Crop is harvested.
